trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Minimiza o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que está no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> para o item especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer" /> associado ao item especificado.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado (expandido ou recolhido) do controle associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O estado do controle que está associado a essa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> método retorna uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objetos que representam o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objetos que pertencem ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" /> value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsCollapsed" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> é <see langword="false" /> e <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Selection" />, esse método retorna um objeto compatível com o padrão de controle; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer" /> está fora da tela.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> estiver recolhido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Essa API não está implementada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> permite que mais de um elemento filho seja selecionado simultaneamente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon" /> exige que, pelo menos, um elemento filho seja selecionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>.
